profiles.name: The Optimist
profiles.description: You move through the world with hope and honesty. Others find your energy refreshing, and your boundaries respectful.

profiles.name: The Realist
profiles.description: You’re not here to sugarcoat. You value real connection and clear communication.

profiles.name: The Architect
profiles.tagline: You plan for connection like others plan for brunch.
profiles.description: Reliable, thoughtful, and a little over-prepared. You bring structure to chaos.

profiles.name: The Comet
profiles.description: Your intensity comes in flashes, but your heart is always in it.

profiles.name: The Rebel
profiles.tagline: Breaking rules, not hearts. Or maybe both.
profiles.description: You challenge expectations but you still care deeply. You resist boxes, but you seek connection.

profiles.name: The Mirage
profiles.description: You’re complex, captivating, and sometimes hard to pin down.

profiles.name: The Phantom
profiles.description: You leave an impression. Your style is felt, even when you're gone.

fallbacks.name: Unicorn
fallbacks.description: Your results don’t fit a tidy box, and that’s not a bug—it’s a feature.

fallbacks.name: Stop Sign
fallbacks.description: Your results don’t fit a tidy box, and that’s not a bug—it’s a feature.

fallbacks.name: Lantern
fallbacks.description: Your insight lights the way, even if your own path is still unfolding.

fallbacks.name: Mirror
fallbacks.description: You help others see themselves — sometimes before they’re ready.

fallbacks.name: Flame
fallbacks.description: Intense, passionate, and a little dangerous.

fallbacks.name: Cactus
fallbacks.tagline: Soft on the inside. Very inside.
fallbacks.description: You may be prickly, but your loyalty runs deep.

fallbacks.name: Ghost
fallbacks.description: Connection is hard. So sometimes, you vanish. It’s not personal — even though it is.

attachmentStyles.name: Secure
attachmentStyles.description: You’re comfortable with closeness and independence. You trust, connect, and set boundaries with grace.

attachmentStyles.name: Anxious-Leaning Secure
attachmentStyles.description: You know you’re lovable — but you still worry sometimes. You value connection and can voice your needs.

attachmentStyles.name: Anxious or Avoidant
attachmentStyles.description: You crave closeness but fear it too. You swing between needing reassurance and pulling away.

attachmentStyles.name: Disorganized
attachmentStyles.description: You feel pulled in two directions: desperate for intimacy, but scared of it too.
